title: Drawing, "Villa of M. Hemsy, St. Cloud, Plan du Rez de Chaussee", 1913
medium: Photostat and black ink on paper
markings: Watermark: REPRODUCTION - CHOLLET & CIE A PARIS
signed: Signed lower right: Paris le Mars 1913/ L'Architecte:/ Hector Guimard
inscribed: Top center: PROPRIETE DE MONSIEUR HEMSY/ VILLA A ST. CLOUD/ PLAN DU REZ DE CHAUSSEE
description: Floor plan for the ground floor of the Villa of Monsieur Hemsy at St. Cloud. The function of each room and their scale is noted throughout the design. Beneath the floor plan is a plan for the paths in the garden.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Villa of M. Hemsy, St. Cloud, Plan du Rez de Chaussee", 1913.
1913. Photostat and black ink on paper. Gift of Mme. Hector Guimard. 1950-66-28.
